secret_rule: Only items that are used in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "pencil" and "notebook".

The rule is that you can bring any item that is commonly used for writing, drawing, or taking notes.

Correct! The rule is that only items that are commonly used for writing, drawing, or taking notes in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic. Well done!
